input.sentences: today i decided to display my art for my family . this art is called the ghost man .
this is the man in the wild .
my last art that i showed my family was something very simple . it was the tree that i grew up by near my grandmother house . it was something special about the tree .
output.sentences: There was a ghost who haunted a family from their display case.
He was entirely a ghost, but seemed to have a human eye.
Before he died, the ghost was fine--he was an eagle with an ego.
His eagle self was friends with a wild caveman.
They sat under a tree together--a special tree--and lived a simple life.
